sentences.sContent: Further up the coast in Ofunato, the port’s tugboat still sits in someone’s backyard about a kilometer from the water.
sentences.sContent_eng: Further up the coast in Ofunato, the port’s tugboat still sits in someone’s backyard about a kilometer from the water.
sentences.sCn: 沿着海岸北行到大渡船市，原来在港湾里的拖船，如今还留在距离港湾一公里远的内陆居民住家的后院。

sentences.sContent: If the simulation can plug directly into a satellite database for real-time ocean weather tracking, it might even help future tugboat pilots safely steer with an iceberg in tow.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the simulation can plug directly into a satellite database for real-time ocean weather tracking, it might even help future tugboat pilots safely steer with an iceberg in tow.
sentences.sCn: 如果模拟系统能够直接连入海洋实时天气卫星数据库的话，未来的拖船驾驶员们将能够更安全地拖动冰山。
